item.title: Automate Everything
item.description:
What’s Inside

You didn’t start a business to become a professional email-replier. But here you are — chasing invoices at 10pm, losing customers because you forgot to send the quote, and wondering where your weekend went.

This book fixes that. Not with vague AI hype or enterprise software you can’t afford, but with practical tools that Australian small businesses can set up on a Saturday arvo.

Who It’s For

  • Tradies running solo or with a small crew
  • Consultants stuck in feast-or-famine cycles
  • Small business owners spending more time on admin than actual work
  • Anyone who’s ever sent 47 duplicate invoices by accident (that’s a real story, and it’s in the book)

What You’ll Learn

Part 1 — The Mindset: Where your time actually goes (not where you think it goes), the automation stack explained in plain English, and how to audit your time leaks.

item.title: Off-Grid but Online
item.description:
What’s Inside

You don’t have to choose between modern comfort and self-sufficiency. This book shows you how to build a home that generates its own power, catches its own water, grows its own food — and still has decent WiFi.

Written from real Australian conditions (not American fantasies about Montana cabins), this covers everything from solar system sizing to Starlink installation, from rainwater filtration to composting toilets that don’t make your guests cry.

item.title: Set and Forget
item.description:
What’s Inside

Australia is one of the driest inhabited continents on Earth. Adelaide gets less rain than London. And yet we keep watering our gardens with the sophistication of a bloke with a thumb over a hose.

This book changes that. From smart irrigation controllers that check the weather forecast and skip watering when rain’s coming, to soil moisture sensors that tell you exactly when your tomatoes are thirsty, to complete Home Assistant setups that run your entire garden automatically.

item.title: The Value-Add Property Playbook
item.description:
What’s Inside

The traditional property playbook — buy a house, hope it goes up, buy another one in seven years — is painfully slow. This book is for investors who want to actively create equity, not just wait for it.

Every strategy. Every state’s rules. Real numbers, not “indicative estimates.” From granny flats to NDIS housing, with honest assessments of what works and what doesn’t.

Who It’s For

  • Property investors who already own 1-2 properties and want to accelerate
  • Anyone considering a granny flat, duplex, or subdivision
  • Investors who want real data instead of seminar hype
  • People who’ve been burned by spruikers and want the unvarnished truth

What You’ll Learn

Part 1 — Foundations: The mindset shift, understanding zoning (the 30 minutes that saves $100,000), feasibility studies with real templates, and assembling your team of 15 professionals.
